snippet: Rebel forces attacked the Taftanaz air base early on Saturday morning in fighting with government forces that reportedly continued into the afternoon.
abstract: Syrian rebels launch assault on strategic air base in north of country, trying to disrupt strikes by warplanes and helicopters that pound rebel-held towns and give government of Pres Bashar al-Assad major edge in 20-month-old civil war.
lead_paragraph: Rebel forces attacked the Taftanaz air base early on Saturday morning in fighting with government forces that reportedly continued into the afternoon.

headline.seo: Syria Rebels Attack Key Base in Bid to Disrupt Airstrikes
headline.main: Syria Rebels Attack Key Base in Bid to Disrupt Airstrikes
headline.print_headline: Syria Rebels Attack Key Base in Bid to Disrupt Airstrikes
